item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Jerome K. Jerome
item.description: "I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours." -- Jerome K. Jerome

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "If cats looked like frogs we'd realize what nasty, cruel little bastards they are. Style. That's what people remember." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "If you don't know where you are currently standing, you're dead." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "All of old. Nothing else ever. Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Zoeeeeeeeeeeeeeee add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz
